column4: Traditions by Nick Chavez Yucca Root Shampoo - Imported
column13:
Traditions by Nick Chavez Yucca Root Shampoo - Imported (237 ml) Price: Rs.4000

Traditions by Nick Chavez Yucca Root Shampooing Cream 8 oz (237 ml). Traditions Yucca Root Shampooing Cream is formulated to cleanse restore and provide ultimate hydration and moisture to your hair. this rich and luxurious cream is highly effective on hair that is chemically treated or has a tendency to be dry or brittle. Leaves your hair feeling and looking balanced healthy shiny and beautiful. Yucca Root is used by Native Americans to help prevent hair loss and to make hair shiny and beautiful. Yucca Root Shampooing Cream also contains Wild Yam which balances hormone production to help maintain normal hair growth and Peppermint Oil to stimulant the scalp. Ancient Traditions Modern Technology.
